item.description:
Just found out about this one! All for $40!...

Hear Ye, Hear Ye!

The King & Queen invite ye to New Year's Eve with a Medieval / Renaissance theme, prize for best costume!

Hors D'oeuvres, followed by a Grand Buffet of Steamship Round of Beef fit for a King; Fryer Tuck's Roasted Swine; Sir Hawker's Whole Roasted Turkey; Maid Marian's Baked Haddock; Sir Thellan's Mashed Potatoes; Roast Winter Veggies and more!

Also, "Let them eat cake" Dessert Buffet, cash bar, toast and snacks at Midnight and dancing til 1am!

http://www.alpinegrove.com/New-Year-s-Eve-Buffet.html

$40 per person cash ONLY at the door, or credit card called in before. Opens at 6pm, dinner at 7pm. 8-10 people per table. Call 603-882-9051 for reservations. We've already got 1 table there, but its full, but I opened up another, so ask for the Tom D'Alimonte table! (but if it already has 8, start another! :-)

Its down near me and Robert, off exit 5 Nashua, down 111A, in Hollis. Tom @cell 603-521-8392
item.name: Let's Party Like its 1699! Medieval New Years at Alpine Grove!
